content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio location-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1563615609227{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-6″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6″]

Our Unique Small Business Website Development Process

Would you like to have the best website design for your small business in Bentleigh? Confetti Design offers a great deal of services that can help your ecommerce website convert more! Whether your Bentleigh local business is located at Centre Road or Patternson Road, Confetti Design can help you get found by your potential customers by creating a beautiful and functional web design!

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]

VIEW MORE OF OUR WORK

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1513007553262{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep”][vc_column]

[vc_column_text el_class=”text-not-caps”]

Confetti Design services in Bentleigh

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563605105628{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

From designing your ecommerce website in Bentleigh to developing a brand that sells, we have all your web design service needs to help you succeed in your business

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”services-location”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Design

[vc_column_text]Looking for good designers and professional developers? Confetti Design offers a hands on design and development Service that will help you accomplish an amazing client experience resulting in great conversions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Branding

[vc_column_text]We provide more than just website development, your branding matters and we can ensure you present a consistent online brand. Making sure all your customer touch-points present the same brand messaging and visuals is our passion.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

SEO

[vc_column_text]Getting your site within the first 3 positions on the first page of Google is every businesses goal. We ensure your website goes live with best practise optimisation and then if you are serious about ranking we can help. Our SEO partner is the best Melbourne based Search Engine Optimisation company we know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Shopify Developer

[vc_column_text]Shopify is one of the best platforms for e-commerce, no doubt and we are the right people to help you with your online business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1563674985733{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}” el_class=”location-slider-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1563592372523{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

6 Businesses and industries in Bentleigh that need a high performing website

In our world today, digital advertising is extremely vital if you’d like your business to grow. However, there are some businesses and industries in that might feel they don’t need a website due to numerous reasons. It can be because of the cost, or they don’t need to market to a larger audience. But nothing can be further from the truth.
Here are some of the businesses and industries in that needs a high performing website to sustain and grow the profitability of their businesses.

[vc_column_text]

In the growing competition with all types of businesses nowadays, partnering with a website design agency that can help you achieve your goals is imperative.

Confetti Design offers the best website design that will perfectly fit the industry you’re in, and eventually attract more customers to your business.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604136910{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_01.jpg?id=10889) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564541144877{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Legal practitioners

Since legal services aren’t really needed on a daily basis, one might think that they don’t need a website. However, for you to have clients in Bentleigh, you should establish the trust first before they avail of your services, and this takes time to build.

Creating a good website design specifically to build authority and trust is one of Confetti Design’s many services. All it takes is a meeting with us and we’ll start discussing about your website right away.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604143056{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_02.jpg?id=10890) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564541210406{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Doctors and the health industry

Most of the time, doctors and health practitioners are dependent on the referral of insurance networks in helping them find new clients. However, most people now research first about a clinic or a health service provider even before booking an appointment with them. That is why you should build a website that will showcase the services you offer for your Bentleigh clients. In building trust with your future clients, having your and your staff’s bio along with testimonials from your previous clients are essential.

If you are looking for professional web design company who has years of experience, nothing beats Confetti Design. Our satisfied clients are the testament of the quality of service we have.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604148917{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_03.jpg?id=10891) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564541271944{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Electricians or handymen

Whenever there is an emergency repair that needs immediate attention, people nowadays rely on their Google Assistant or to Siri to find the “best handyman near Bentleigh.” Therefore, you should have a website that can prove the legitimacy of your business. Establishing trust is critical as your future customers will let you into their home, and they will want to know as much information as they can about you.

Confetti Design specialises in small business website design that can help you build the trust of your customers and makes it easier for you to find new clients by making sure your website appears on the first page of search engine results.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563605193309{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/steps_03.jpg?id=10585) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564541329654{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Landscapers

What is the best way for you to showcase the beautiful landscape projects you’ve completed in Bentleigh? You guessed it right—create your website! This will not only immortalize the beauty of your creations but will also be easily accessible to your future customers as they search for landscapers in Bentleigh online.

You need a web developer in Melbourne who can present your portfolio beautifully on your website? Contact Confetti Design and we will give you expert advise.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563606071852{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/confetti-design-business-essentials-set-up.jpg?id=10900) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564016791506{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Accountants

Every business need someone who will take care of their books and keep them organized, that’s why accountants are one of the professions that will always be in demand. When you are starting your own accounting practice in Bentleigh or your own accounting firm, it is crucial that you showcase your background and your services in a website so that your future clients will know you better even before meeting you.

Confetti Design is a website development company that not only builds websites but also help you build your brand.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563605902079{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_06.jpg?id=10892) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564541446800{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

The food industry

We now live in a world where all information is available at your fingertips. Knowing that food is one of the basic necessities, we browse about food all the time. If your local food business in Bentleigh doesn’t have a website, customers in your area will not know right away what kind of food you offer. Or they might have heard about you but went to your store after closing hours. Having a beautiful website for your small business will bring more customers at your doorstep.

Whether you are in need of expert advise for your small business website design in Bentleigh or anywhere in Melbourne, Confetti Design is just a phone call or email away to help you grow your food business.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563674973547{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563674929940{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564541522408{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Confetti Design caters to clients from Bentleigh, Gardenvale, Sandringham, and nearby areas. Our unparalleled web design and development services have proven to work with our clients!

Below are the small business web design testimonials from our valued clients.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1563674945481{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Personal Brand Expert

You want to engage Johannah as the woman who understands the complexities of building powerful brands and web sites that have impact. She also openly shares her extended network of like-minded professionals and experts in their field. to help you.

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

Johannah has a lovely, calm, insightful approach in taking your vision and transforming it into a beautiful site.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah's service is second to none and she responded within minutes to each of my requests or calls for help. I would highly recommend Confetti Design

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

What's My Style

Johannah understands small business and their needs, making the start-up journey and challenges easier. Being genuine and truly lovely is a bonus.

Nicky McMillan

Eat Drink Innovate

Confetti Design briefing process helped me to dive deep into my business & helped clarify what I really wanted to communicate via my brand.

Susie White

Moxo Living

Johannah is a delight to work with. She was always fully engaged with the issue at hand and always offered additional tips and guidance along the way.

Corinne De Castro Basto
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Contact us for an instant over-the-phone quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
